Posts.Content: Thanks for getting back to me.  I was thinking of getting those kind of eye drops for her but just wondered if anyone on here had experienced the same thing and a particular one had helped.  I will head to the chemist 1st thing and speak to the pharmacist.  Thanks again X
Posts.Title: awful dry sore eyes

Posts.Content: Hi.  I was wondering if anyone here has had problems with dry sore eyes during fec t? She is on her 4cycle, has lost all her eyelashes and she is struggling to even open her eyes in the morning.  Is there something I could buy over the counter to help this? Thanks in advance for any advice X
